page.title: 01BALA - NORTH
page.content: Bala functions as a market town and service centre for Ponllyn as a summer tourist resort. The part of the town within this block consists of part the High Street which spans the CBD of the town, two council estates, Bleenddol and Cysgod Y Cobg and two private estates Cae Gadlas and Pencraig, the latter being the most prestigios. It also includes the SSD pupil Ingol Y Berwyn and the recently renamed Ingol Beimo Sant (Chin Wales). Welsh is the normal language of the population but most young people under the age of 20 particularly from the council estates prefer to speak English.
